name: Alchemy
description: Proficiencies for working with the elements and transforming substances.
You are attuned to the side of magic focusing on control.  You use your will to make the Universe bow to your wishes.  Ultimately this manifests itself as a focus on Mankind.
You are attuned to the side of magic focusing on harmony.  Harmony is the Universe expressing itself through you.  You are only acting as a conduit, but you can direct the power using your will.
